channel.title: Case ID's

item.title: Case ID's
item.dc:creator: @magep00ner12 magep00ner12
item.description:
@magep00ner12 wrote:

Well I’ve tryed searching but i didnt find anything so imma ask it here.

Does anyone know how to print out the case ID’s/action buttons?
Like when you press on the “run” button it will print out 153. (because the running button is case 153)

Edit: NVM got it my self, pretty stupid that i didnt found out at first because its really easy. If anyone needs it:
System.out.println("ActionButtonID = "+c.actionButtonId);

Read full topic
